dkim-success: DKIM register request has passed. Please enter your desired username and password in the following form. You can also save this page's web address to register later
dkim-pending: Your DKIM register request needs approval from the administrator. Please return to this page and retry later. It's suggested that you save this page's web address to retry later
dkim-rejected: Your DKIM register request is rejected, reason: %1
dkim-summary-label: Click here to see DKIM verify result
